text: This is a list of colleges and universities in North Dakota: ==Public== *Cankdeska Cikana Community College *Fort Berthold Community College *North Dakota University System **Bismarck State College **Dickinson State University **Lake Region State College **Mayville State University **Minot State University **Minot State University-Bottineau **North Dakota State University **North Dakota State College of Science **University of North Dakota **Valley City State University **Williston State College *Sitting Bull College *Turtle Mountain Community College *United Tribes Technical College ==Private== *Aakers Business College *Jamestown College *Trinity Bible College *University of Mary ==References== * Category:North Dakota Category:Lists of colleges and universities North Dakota
title: Colleges and universities in North Dakota
